H0.text: What viral disease is also called infectious parotitis. Rubella

H1.text: What viral disease is also called infectious parotitis. Influenza

H2.text: What viral disease is also called infectious parotitis. Mononucleosis

H3.text: What viral disease is also called infectious parotitis. MUMPS

A4.text: Mumps is a highly contagious viral disease caused by the mumps virus.

A5.text: MuV spreads to the parotid glands, causing the signature parotitis.
